The NPS EML Script is an R script and accompanying documentation to facilitate using EMLassemblyline to generate EML metadata for data NPS packages prior to uploading to DataStore.

To report bugs or request enhancements, please use post an  [issue](https://github.com/nationalparkservice/NPS_EML_Script/issues) on github or email [Rob Baker](mailto:robert_baker@nps.gov%20?subject="NPS EML Script")
